name: Accounting-app
description: Frontend interface for an accounting app. The objective here was to create a responsive design that renders the content of each section on the same page.

name: Blog
description: This project aims to explore the functionality of MongoDB and learn about the POST and GET methods, as well as generating dynamic URLs.

name: Calculator
description: Calculator app, initially designed for a course with basic functions, I added some extra features, turning it into a scientific calculator.

name: Dice-Game
description: This is a Dice Game created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app provides a simple interface where two players can test their luck. Click 'Play,' roll one dice for each player, and determine the winner.

name: Drum
description: A simple drum simulator created with vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS featuring seven different pieces to choose from. The selection includes a bass drum, snare drum, hi-hat, tom, cymbal, floor tom, and cowbell. You can play the drums using either your keyboard or mouse.

name: E-commerce
description: This project is an e-commerce website built using Django, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, with features such as user authentication, product browsing and search, cart management, and payment integration. It also includes an admin panel for managing products, orders, and users.

name: EasySchedule
description: My first functional Python application. Despite the challenges, I successfully created an application for schedule management. This tool is designed to collect client information and store it in a table for future reference.

name: Email-Marketing
description: The purpose of this project is to create a Newsletter using the Mailchimp API. The project will collect basic information from customers, such as their email, first name, and last name.

name: Form-multi-step
description: This project is a form with 4 steps where the user submits their data separately to provide a better user experience while filling out each step.

name: GeisielMelo
description: Repository associated with my GitHub homepage.

name: GNM-Chat
description: A complete chat platform where you can add contacts and send real-time messages, very simple to use and fully responsive.

name: LandingPage
description: I crafted a landing page as part of the Otavio Miranda course, applying the knowledge gained throughout the program. The objective of this project was to construct a responsive and visually appealing single-page website, utilizing the elements provided in the course.

name: Medium-level-login-system
description: Medium-level login system inspired by the old League of Legends login screen. Developed in my free time using the MERN tech stack, the goal is to provide a clean and aesthetically pleasing user experience.

name: MinimalApi
description: API created as part of my studies of C# ASP .NET Core 8. The objective of this app is to create a safe, fast, and scalable API.

name: Profile-visualizer
description: A more effective way to view user information through graphs and statistics. Here, you can access all relevant details about GitHub users with ease.

name: Qrcode-generator
description: Generate QR Codes instantly with this application, designed for hassle-free creation based on user input. Ideal for sharing contact details, website links, or custom messages, it also allows easy downloads for versatile usage in projects or printed materials.

name: React-table
description: Learning how to make advanced tables in HTML with react-table package. This app illustrates the step-by-step development of a comprehensive advanced table, organized into 5 stages.

name: reminders-client
description: Reminders' frontend, an intuitive note-taking app inspired by Google Keep. Built with the MERN stack, emphasizing efficiency in React, database management, and authentication.

name: reminders-server
description: This API offers essential endpoints for user authentication, user data retrieval, and repository information. It supports key features such as sign-in, sign-out, user creation, and repository management, enhancing the functionality of the reminders application.

name: RestfulAPI
description: TypeScript RESTful API built with  Node and Express. This repository serves as a template for streamlined development, allowing for quick setup and bypassing minor implementation steps in future applications.

name: Simon-Game
description: Every time you successfully reproduce the sequence, the game will become more challenging, adding more elements to the sequence. But be careful, if you make a mistake, the game will end and you will have to start over.

name: SplashScreen
description: Circular Splash Screen is designed to check the existence of certain files and create them if they don't exist to ensure proper system functionality.

name: TMDb
description: An app created in my free time with the aim of being a front-end-only application powered by data from TheMovieDB. It was designed to be a user-friendly platform where you can effortlessly search for movie and series information.

name: v1
description: A platform designed to streamline communication and showcase my projects. It was one of my first projects on React, but I believe I did a great job.

name: v2
description: Version 2.0 of my portfolio, built with Vite for better performance and featuring new additions such as an archive page and direct contact functionality.

name: video-creator-robot
description: Application developed to create mass quiz-style videos for social media platforms such as TikTok, Kawai, YouTube, etc.

name: Weather
description: Weather application that provides real-time weather information based on the user's exact location using Geolocation. It includes a search bar implementation for users to search for weather conditions in specific locations.
